ORGANIZATION_NOABBREV: Organization Name (Full legal Name - no abbreviations)
COMPANY_NOABBREV: Company Name (Full legal Name - no abbreviations)
BILLING_DIFFERENT: Select to enter a billing address that is different from the Applicantâ€™s Contact Information
ADVANCE_FEE_PAYMENT: The fee has been paid in the amount of (please enter the fee amount)
FINANCIAL: Payment through a Canadian Financial Institution
CREDIT_CARD: MasterCard / Visa / American Express (AMEX) / Visa Debit / JCB International
MED_INGRED: Medicinal Ingredient(s) (as provided on the NOC for the NDS provided in Section 3)
PROD_NAME: Product Name (as provided on the NOC for the NDS provided in Section 3)
TIMELYDATE: Date of first marketing approval application
TIMELYCOUNTRY: Country of first marketing approval application
NOC_120: on the basis of a patent granted on or before the day on which the Notice of Compliance (NOC) for the above noted NDS is issued (before the end of the 120-day period that begins on the day on which the NOC is issued), or
GRANT_120: on the basis of a patent granted after the day on which the Notice of Compliance (NOC) for the above noted NDS is issued (before the end of the 120-day period that begins on the day on which the patent is granted)
APPLICANT_OWNER: The Applicant is the patentee and is recorded as an owner of the above noted Canadian Patent at the Canadian Intellectual Property Office, or
APPLICANT_BEHALF: the Applicant is a manufacturer who is authorized by the person recorded in the Canadian Intellectual Property Office as the owner of the above noted Canadian Patent to file this application on their behalf and the above noted NDS was issued to the Applicant.
LOAD_CSP_FILE: Load a Saved Certificate of Supplementary Protection Application File
CONTACT_TITLE: Applicant Contact Information (where all communications regarding the CSP will be sent)
ADVANCE_PAYMENT_FEE: The Advance Payment Fee must not be greater than 1,000,000
ACK_FEE_SUBMIT: The Advance Payment Details form is being submitted separately by fax or mail .
ADV_PAYM: ( The Advance Payment Details form is a required part of the CSP application )
NOAPPLICATION: When the application for the authorization for sale referred to in paragraph 106(1)(c) of the Patent Act (above noted NDS) was filed with the Minister of Health, no application for a marketing approval, equivalent to an authorization for sale, with respect to the medicinal ingredient or combination of medicinal ingredients, as the case may be, set out in this CSP application had been submitted in the European Union or any country that is a member of the European Union, the United States of America, Australia, Switzerland, Japan or the United Kingdom; or
APPLICATION: if one or more applications for a marketing approval, equivalent to an authorization for sale, with respect to the medicinal ingredient or combination of medicinal ingredients, as the case may be, set out in this CSP application had been submitted in one or more of the European Union or any country that is a member of the European Union, the United States of America, Australia, Switzerland, Japan or the United Kingdom, the application for the authorization for sale referred to in paragraph 106(1)(c) of the Patent Act (above noted NDS) was filed with the Minister of Health before the end of the 12 month period that begins on the date of submission of the first of those marketing approval applications. Details of the first of those marketing approval applications are as follows:
FEE_PREAMBLE: This electronic form should not include payment information (e.g. credit card number), as the information included within an electronic form cannot be deleted and will remain a part of the CSP application on record.
HELP_NOC: Expand Notice of Compliance Date Instructions
HELP_MARKETDATE: Expand Date of first marketing approval application Instructions
MARKETDATE_CLOSE: Date of first marketing approval application Instructions
MARKETDATE_INSTRUCT: Date of first marketing approval application Instructions
DISCLAIMER: The contents of this form may be publicly disclosed.
